metadata.name: Unsigned AppX Installation Attempt Using Add-AppxPackage - PsScript
metadata.comment: Detects usage of the "Add-AppxPackage" or it's alias "Add-AppPackage" to install unsigned AppX packages

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('add-apppackage ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('add-appxpackage '))) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' -allowunsigned')))

output.summary: Detects usage of the "Add-AppxPackage" or it's alias "Add-AppPackage" to install unsigned AppX packages

metadata.objective: False positive: Installation of unsigned packages for testing purposes References: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/msix/package/unsigned-package, https://twitter.com/WindowsDocs/status/1620078135080325122
